Job_title: Specialist - General Surgery (For Evercare Hospital Dhaka) - Job ID : 1301209
Description:
Evercare Hospital Dhaka is looking for Specialist - General Surgery

Job Description / Responsibility
Assessment of patients on admission.
Detailed history taking and Physical examination and documentation with in the first 24 hours of admission.
Responsible for sending the patient for the appropriate investigation as directed by the primary consultant and also to authorize investigations, which are urgent.
Take daily rounds of the surgical patients in the wards and assess them for treatment as deemed fit by his / her consultant and review them regularly.
He/ she is to complete the In-Patient rounds everyday before, and fill the case sheets and progress notes & all the necessary documents & JCI document in specific chart of medical record without fail.
Responsible for providing adequate treatment to the patient as advised and to check the dosage, frequency, route of administrations of all medications, considering all precautions.
Continually monitor and review patient progress and adjust the management plan when necessary and to take appropriate initiatives in Medical and surgical emergencies when required.
Preparation of discharge summaries well in time and briefing the patient about the medications on discharge.
Follow hospital practices and demonstrate initiative aligned to ensuring the safest possible environment for patients and staff.
To attend all clinical meetings and work shops and actively participate in paper presentations.
To be part of training programs conducted in the hospital and to take continuous initiatives for knowledge and skill up gradation.
To be involved in teaching programs that is held by the department
To oversee the activities of the Residents and guide them
To be an active member for the quality initiatives of the hospital
Educational Requirements
FCPS / MS in General Surgery
Experience Requirements
1 to 3 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):
Hospital

Job_title: Production Manager, Plastic Division (For Jyoti Plastic Company (Concern Of Prome Agro Foods Limited)-Job ID: 1298225
Description:
Jyoti Plastic Company (Concern Of Prome Agro Foods Limited) is looking for Production Manager, Plastic Division

Key Points
Candidates who has experience to work in similar position in plastic company are highly encouraged to apply for this post.

Job Description / Responsibility
To manage the production and all the related activities/process and department as per planning.
To follow up the implementation of work orders according the food production and sales plan.
Analyzing wastage prevention and scrap production to maintain expected production rate.
Create a database for each equipment separately, including a record of faults, maintenance expenses and spare parts used.
Generate daily production report according to machine production capacity and worker efficiency analysis.
Allocates day to day manpower for different functions on the production lines and solve any rising issues.
Evaluate the operator`s performance.
Provide supervisors and technicians with the information necessary to raise their technical and administrative competence.
Follow up on raw materials stock and making sure purchase orders are done promptly.
Interface with customers and suppliers, visits both as necessary.
Ensures employees are properly trained in all aspects of their jobs to include safety, quality and production.
Performs other duties as assigned by Management.

Educational Requirements
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Electrical & Electronic Engineering
Diploma in Engineering in Electrical & Electronic Engineering
Skills Required: Injection, technical Knowledge in Tharmo

Experience Requirements
5 to 8 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):
Manufacturing (FMCG), Plastic Factory, Plastic Industries, Production
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):
Plastic/ Polymer Industry

Additional Requirements
Experience in plastic manufacturing companies (blow molding)
Applicants must have 5 to 8 years practical experience in similar position. Must have proper knowledge and experience to work with : PP, HDPE, One time plastic product & LDPE.

Job Location
Dhaka (Uttar Khan)

Job_title: Senior Software Engineer (SAP) - (For BJIT Ltd.)-Job ID: 1294234
Description:
BJIT Ltd. is looking for Senior Software Engineer (SAP)

Job Description / Responsibility
Design, develop or build, improve, test and support Applications using ABAP on HANA
Provide technical guidance to product owners, Scrum master, functional teams, testing teams, compliance, and other development team members across different sectors /platforms
Provide documented technical design proposals, estimates, specifications, and maintenance guides
Collaborate with External Vendor Consultants from Onsite/Offshore locations
Lead and own the entire development process, from designing and implementing user-friendly UIs to developing robust back-end functionalities and ensuring seamless integration with other SAP products
Guide/ lead architecture decisions in your team based on industry standards and best practices, lead adherence to architectural principles, SAP product-specific guidelines, and product standards 
Design, code, test and assure quality of complex product features via Agile techniques.Â· Verify that the delivered product meets the functional and design requirements and sign off on delivery
Investigate, analyze complex problems; and resolve critical issues
Be an expert in the SAP BTP ABAP Environment, a cutting-edge Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) offering for ABAP Cloud Development 
Be an expert of SAP Integration Suite to drive integration of cloud-based processes, services, applications, events and data
Be actively involved in the preparation, conception, realization, and Go Live of customer implementation projects 
Demonstrate the ability to plan, run, and manage blueprint workshops/meetings with internal and external clients
Analyze business processes and assisting in defining the scope of a project/opportunities, estimating efforts and project timelines 
Upgrade and migration of SAP systems

Educational Requirements
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science & Engineering

Experience Requirements
At least 4 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Software Company

Additional Requirements
Hands-on development experience in ABAP on HANA with good exposure to the different types and complexities of developments using classic and newer technologies.
Experience with S/4 HANA Extensibility Framework/Techniques
Solid understanding of web development technologies like SAP UI5, HTML5, Web Services, SOAP, JavaScript & Web frameworks.
Strong hands-on knowledge in end-to-end UX development cycle & design principles such as Fiori.
Detailed experience in ABAP CDS views, oDATA, REST/JSON, XML (including debugging)
Sound analytical and problem-solving skills with experience in debugging and root cause analysis and the ability to propose/implement suitable resolutions for such issues as bug fixes and performance tuning, etc.
Good knowledge of business processes in more than one of the following S/4 HANA modules: SD, MM, PP, EWM, and APO.
Experience in CAP (Cloud Application Programming Model) & RAP (RESTful ABAP Application Programming model)
Hands on experience of tools like Business Application Studio, SAP HANA Studio/Eclipse & GIT
Minimum 2+ years of CORE ABAP Experience with 1 year working in S/4HANA environments in medium to large scale. 
Experience in requirement analysis and effort estimation with WBS 
Ability to drill down into technical issues and solve complex and detailed problems
Ability to deliver clear, concise presentations and present complex information in a clear and precise manner
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English 
Mindset to long-term work and professional growth within the company. 

Job Location
Bangladesh, Dhaka

Workplace Work at office and projects

Job Description:
Softronixs is looking for a talented and experienced Backend Developer to join our team. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our server-side application logic using Laravel and/or Express.js. You will work closely with our front-end developers, designers, and other team members to deliver high-quality, scalable, and efficient web applications.
Responsibilities:
Develop, test, and maintain server-side application logic using Laravel and/or Express.js
Design and implement database schemas
Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Implement security and data protection measures
Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices
Requirements:
Proven work experience as a Backend Developer, with a focus on Laravel and/or Express.js
Strong knowledge of PHP and/or Node.js
Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web services
Understanding of front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Knowledge of version control (e.g., Git)
Ability to work in a team environment and independently when needed
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (preferred but not required)
Bonus Skills:
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Knowledge of Docker and containerization
Understanding of microservices architecture
Contribution to open-source projects
Benefits:
Competitive salary
Flexible working hours
Opportunities for growth and learning
Dynamic and collaborative work environment

We'd love to hear from you if you are a skilled Backend Developer with expertise in Laravel and/or Express.js! Please submit your resume, along with a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and why you'd be a great fit for our team.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume and cover letter to hr@softronixs.com with the subject line "Backend Developer Application - [Your Name]". We look forward to hearing from you!

Position: Vice Principal
Job Overview:
Averroes International School, one of the leading Islamic English medium institutions in Bangladesh, renowned for its academic excellence and holistic student development, is seeking a dynamic and visionary Vice Principal to join our team. This role will encompass leadership responsibilities across our Lalmatia, Mirpur, and Uttara branches, ensuring high standards in both academics and administration while fostering a positive school culture based on Islamic values.

Key Responsibilities:
Lead the development of syllabi, teaching materials, session plans, and class routines to ensure academic rigor.
Oversee and implement school policies, rules, and regulations aligned with the institution's vision and Islamic values.
Inspire and guide the school community towards achieving academic excellence.
Ensure the highest standards of teaching and learning across the schoolâ€™s programs.
Promote a positive, inclusive, and student-centered school culture grounded in Islamic principles.
Manage and develop a diverse team of educators, fostering professional growth and collaboration.
Engage actively with parents, students, and the community to build strong relationships.

Requirements:

Education:
Masterâ€™s degree in Education, Educational Leadership, or a related field.

Experience:
5-10 years of experience in education.
At least 5 years of experience as a Vice Principal, Section Head, or Coordinator in a reputable school, preferably in an English medium institution.
Alternatively, 10 yearsâ€™ experience as a senior position with demonstrated administrative skills.

Additional Requirements:
Proven leadership experience with strong administrative abilities.
Exceptional command over the English language in all formsâ€”speaking, writing, and comprehension.
Strong communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
Passion for fostering a student-centered learning environment that embraces innovative teaching methods and modern resources.
Experience managing educational programs and staff in a technologically advanced, internationally oriented environment.
Commitment to academic success, alongside nurturing the personal, social, and emotional growth of students.
Demonstrated ability to engage parents, students, and the broader community in the educational process.
Candidates with experience in Islamic English medium schools will be given preference.

Compensation & Benefits:
Competitive and attractive salary commensurate with experience.
Two festival bonuses, Contributory Provident Fund, and other benefits as per school policy.
Professional growth opportunities within a supportive and collaborative work environment.

Workplace:
Full-time position based at the Lalmatia, Mirpur, and Uttara branches of Averroes International School.
 How to Apply:
This is an excellent opportunity to lead a top-tier Islamic English medium school that emphasizes both academic excellence and character education, preparing students for success in a globalized world while upholding Islamic values. Candidates with prior experience in similar institutions will be given preference. Join us in shaping the future of education and making a lasting impact in the lives of our students and school community.


Or

Role Overview

The SLCP verifier plays a critical role in ensuring the accuracy and integrity of data collected during social and labor assessments within global supply chains. This position involves conducting detailed reviews and on-site inspections of facilities to verify compliance with SLCP standards. The verifier collaborates with facility management and workers to gather accurate information and identify discrepancies. The verifier should ensure that collected data is reliable and consistent.

Tasks

Key Responsibilities

Conduct On-Site Inspections: Visit facilities to cross-check data and interview stakeholders for accurate verification.
Prepare Reports: Draft detailed reports highlighting findings, discrepancies, and areas for improvement.
Engage with Stakeholders: Work closely with facility management and workers to facilitate the verification process and provide feedback.
Maintain Compliance: Adhere to SLCP protocols and ethical standards, staying updated on industry best practices.

Requirements

Qualifications:

Education: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Social Sciences, Labor Relations, Human Resources, Environmental Science, or a related field.
Language Proficiency: Local Language of Bangladesh with C1-level proficiency in English
Certifications: Certification as an SLCP Verifier is preferred.
Any other relevant certifications in social compliance auditing or labor rights such as SA8000, SMETA, WRAP etc...

Professional Experience

Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in social compliance auditing, labor standards verification, or a similar field.
Prior experience working with SLCP or other social compliance frameworks is highly desirable.

Key Competencies

Strong understanding of labor standards, social compliance, and supply chain issues.
Excellent analytical skills with a keen eye for detail.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact with a diverse range of stakeholders.
Proficiency in report writing and documentation.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple verification assignments simultaneously.

Additional Requirements

Willingness to travel to conduct on-site verifications.
Fluency in English.
Adherence to SLCPâ€™s Code of Conduct and Ethical Guidelines.

We specialize in providing comprehensive education consultancy services for international students seeking admission to universities across the UK, EU, and other destinations. Our dedicated team consists of experienced professionals and education specialists who are committed to guiding students through the application process, ensuring a smooth transition to their chosen institutions.

Role Description
We are looking for a full-time on-site Compliance Officer to oversee university applications, admissions, and student visa processing for institutions in the UK, EU, and Australia. This role involves daily responsibilities such as:
Processing university applications
Maintaining effective communication with educational institutions
Managing student visa applications
Preparing students for interviews
Writing Pre-CAS scripts
Drafting Statements of Purpose (SOP)

Overview

Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Right Balance applies the latest technology and the best engineering practices to help businesses grow. Weâ€™re in the top 50 companies to watch in LA.

 Role Details 

Weâ€™re looking for a dedicated part-time HR Administrator to join our team. In this role, you will be a critical support pillar for our human resources department, managing and owning a variety of administrative tasks and serving as the primary point of contact for our team on HR-related topics.

If you are a detail-oriented, proactive, and organized professional with a passion for HR and supporting people, then this opportunity is for you. Success in this role requires maintaining accurate records and handling sensitive information with the utmost confidentiality. As a collaborative team player who can work independently in a fast-paced environment, youâ€™ll have the opportunity to make meaningful contributions to our team and help shape our HR practices.

 Whatâ€™s in it for you 

 Work with open-minded technologists on new and exciting ideas. 
 Career growth opportunities in a rapidly growing company. 
 Opportunity to refine our internal HR processes and contribute to a positive work culture. 
 Working directly with executives making meaningful contributions. 
 Work remotely at the comfort of your home or a shared co-working space. 
 Being able to help real companies make a positive impact globally. 


 Responsabilities 

 Serve as the Primary HR Contact: Act as the main point of contact for team members regarding HR-related inquiries, including PTO, contracts, reimbursements, and other HR policies and procedures. 
 Administrative Support: Manage day-to-day HR administrative tasks such as maintaining accurate employee records, updating HR databases, and handling employee documentation with discretion and confidentiality. 
 Performance Management: Coordinate and support the performance review process, gather and organize feedback, and assist with compensation adjustments to ensure a smooth and fair evaluation process. 
 Payroll Support: Collaborate with the finance team to assist with payroll administration, ensuring smooth payment review and release. 
 Policy Implementation: Help enforce HR policies and procedures, ensuring they are understood and followed across the organization. 
 Employee Relations: Provide support to employees, addressing any HR-related concerns or issues in a timely and professional manner. 
 Process Improvement: Identify opportunities to improve HR processes and workflows, contributing to a more efficient and effective HR department. 


 Required Qualifications 

 Upper Intermediate to Advanced spoken and written English. Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to address employee inquiries and provide clear guidance on HR topics. 
 Experience in HR Administration in IT companies: 5+ years of experience in HR administration or a similar role, with a solid understanding of HR processes and best practices, especially in IT staffing companies. 
 Staff Augmentation / Staffing agency: 2+ years of experience in Staff Augmentation or Staffing agency. 
 Attention to Detail: Ability to maintain accurate and organized records, handle sensitive information with confidentiality, and ensure compliance with company policies. 
 Proactive and Self-Motivated: Demonstrated ability to work independently, take initiative, and prioritize tasks effectively in a part-time role. 
 Organizational Skills: Proven ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities, supporting various HR functions such as performance management, and payroll support. 
 Team Player: Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and contribute to a positive work environment. 
 Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to anticipate and resolve issues related to HR processes and employee relations in a timely and professional manner. 


 Nice to haves 

 Experience in a Startup Environment: Familiarity with the unique challenges and dynamics of working in a start-up, particularly in a remote or distributed team setting. 
 Experience with US-based HR Practices: Understanding of US labor typical procedures, including payroll, benefits administration, and employment contracts. 
 Experience Supporting Performance Management: Background in managing performance review processes, handling feedback, and implementing compensation adjustments. 
 Passion for Employee Engagement: A proactive approach to fostering a positive workplace culture through initiatives that support employee satisfaction and engagement. 


 Frequently Asked Questions 

What are your typical clients?

The majority of our clients are venture-backed startups at the growth stage. Usually, at this stage, the company already achieved a product-market fit and is looking to expand rapidly. Thatâ€™s where we bring the best engineering practices, strong architecture, the latest technologies, and consistent processes to help companies scale.

What is the length of your engagements?

Like many of our engagements, this is a long-term opportunity that is expected to last for multiple years. It allows you to evolve your career with the client company taking on more responsibilities.

Whatâ€™s your company size?

The Right Balance team is 60+ engineers going to 100+ by the end of the year. The timing is great to be a part of a rapidly growing team making meaningful contributions.

What are your core values?

Client First: we only win when our clients win. We treat client challenges as our own.

Ownership: we embrace responsibility, taking on challenges, getting them to completion, and enjoying getting things done.

Quality: weâ€™re passionate about achieving quality outcomes by applying meticulous attention to detail.

English Version

We are looking for a proactive advisor for our department with special expertise and/or interest in chemicals and the physical working environment. The role contributes to continuous improvement while taking care of the company's need for a proper working environment. The tasks will consist of, among other things, attending to regulatory requirements, customer requirements, and Halliburton's internal requirements laid down in procedures and guidelines. Mapping and evaluation of risk, as well as associated identification of risk-reducing measures offshore and onshore will be core tasks. Work experience from offshore, chemical handling, and physical working environment factors will be emphasized. In addition, you are part of the introduction program for our new employees.

Our values are the foundation for everything we do. If you can identify with our values: Safety, Trust, Collaboration, Integrity and Respect you can be the one we are looking for.

Tasks

 Address regulatory requirements, customer requirements, and Halliburton's internal procedures and policies, with a primary focus on chemicals and physical working environment factors 
 Map and evaluate risk offshore and onshore, as well as contribute to identifying risk-reducing measures within the area 
 Occasional travel related to the work area both onshore and offshore must be expected 
 Participate in the planning and implementation of risk-based health monitoring and follow-up (RUG) and targeted health surveys (MHU) 
 Take care of administrative tasks and meeting activities that fall under the area 
 Map the need for training, supervise and coordinate, as well as teach relevant HSE courses in the company in Norwegian and English 
 Be an active driver in achieving Halliburton's goals 
 Work closely with customers internally and externally, as well as suppliers and authorities 
 General HSE tasks and advice in the company 
 Contribute as an instructor and facilitator for the training of employees in Health, Safety and Environment 


Qualifications

 HSE Technical College and/or relevant Bachelor (BsC), experience and personal suitability will be able to compensate for formal competence 
 Minimum 5 years of relevant experience in the oil industry, advantage of experience from offshore 
 Must be fluent in Norwegian and English, both written and oral 
 Must master working in the company's management system and web-based databases

Job_title: Senior Software Developer (Java Spring Boot & React)
Description:
Company Description
Welcome to Celestial Invention - Your Trusted Software Partner in Bangladesh. Celestial Invention is a dynamic and innovative software company based in Bangladesh. Specializing in developing cutting-edge solutions, we empower businesses to thrive in the digital age. With a skilled team and a passion for technology, we deliver exceptional software products and services tailored to meet our clients' unique needs.

Role Description
We are looking for a highly skilled software engineer who is comfortable with both front and back end programming. The person we are looking for will be responsible for developing and designing front end and back end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications, and managing the cloud. S/he should possess a passion for enterprise business application (Mobile / Web) technologies and will work with the next generation of advanced enterprise development and implementation platforms. This position will offer the chance to work in a fast-paced, hyper-growth environment where innovative ideas are encouraged and collaboration is a must.


Key Responsibilities
â€¢ Core system and API development in the Spring Boot framework
â€¢ Developing front end and backend application architectures
â€¢ Integrating various 3rd party APIs
â€¢ Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones.
â€¢ Creating/managing servers and databases for functionality
â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze, design, and process new changes in production environment
â€¢ Good knowledge of API Testing
â€¢ Hands-on experiences in the full life cycle of application development
â€¢ Maintain and evolve the continuous integration and continuous deployment processes.
â€¢ Determine technical feasibility by evaluating requirements and analysis as well as proposed solutions.
â€¢ Debug production issues across services and levels of the stack.
â€¢ Seeing through a project from conception to finished product
â€¢ Triaging production issues and driving all the way to RCA
â€¢ Strong experience working under Agile/SCRUM development methodologies.

Qualifications
â€¢ MS/BS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering with at least 5 years of relevant experience
â€¢ Expert level of Experience in Java Spring/Spring Boot
â€¢ Solution Design and Architectural strong knowledge
â€¢ Extreme Integration and XP concept
â€¢ Moderate level of experience in understanding .Net Core & .Net based project to transform the existing solution would be a plus.
â€¢ API-m & Azure Service Operation and DevOps understanding
â€¢ Experience working with JavaScript / jQuery
â€¢ Hands-on working experience on ReactJs and React-Native.
â€¢ Strong Linux server experience
â€¢ Understanding of containerization and orchestration frameworks like Docker and Kubernetes
â€¢ Hands-on working experience with Microservice based Applications and managing CI/CD pipelines.
â€¢ Expertise in working with Public cloud platforms, especially Azure
â€¢ Thorough understanding of the REST and Web API, JSON, and XML
â€¢ Excellent verbal communication skills, especially in English

Good to Have
â€¢ Strong data analytics skills to understand application flow & integrations
â€¢ Strong implementation knowledge of Azure and cloud cognitive services

Job Type: Full Time
Vacancy: 1
Experience: 5+ years

Benefits
Industry Standard Salary
Remote job
Clear focus
Diverse Workplace
Agile environment
Growth opportunity and career path

Apply Procedure
If you believe you are the right candidate, then send your CV to hello@celestialinvention.com with the exact subject line â€œSSD_SPRINGBOOT_10112024â€ by November 30, 2024.

Important: A resume attached without the above subject line will not be processed. Your CV must include your photograph.

Are you ready to join the Celestials?

About the job

Job Responsibilities:
Expected to be target oriented and ensure the achievement on time.
Setting Sales goals & developing sales strategies the incumbent has to visit clients.
Creating new customers to accrue the sales target.
Handling customer queries and complaints Building a strong relationship with the customer.
Arrange project visits for the clients as per requirement Maintain & Update customer database
Visit and follow up with prospective customers regularly. Maintain relationships with existing customers.

Education:
Post Graduate Degree from any reputed University

Experience:
Must have at least 10-12 years of practical experience in Real Estate industry.

Salary: As per company policy

Benefits: 
Mobile bill, Provident fund, T/A
Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize
Salary Review: Yearly
Festival Bonus: 2

Job Location: Dhaka

Application Deadline: October 30, 2024

Experienced and eligible candidates are requested to send updated CV to mdakaium@hotmail.com.

Job_title: Freelance Traditional Chinese (Taiwan) into English Life Sciences Translator
Description:
Position Summary:
Linguists are key players at TransPerfect. Your particular language skill and subject matter expertise will allow you to create and finalize the end product before it goes to the client. Under the guidance of your manager and in collaboration with Project Managers, youâ€™ll be responsible for translating and proofreading documents pertaining to a variety of clients in the Life Sciences sectors. TransPerfect offers the possibility to work remotely anywhere in the world.

In order to meet the translation needs of our international clients, we are currently looking to expand our database of freelance linguists who translates from Traditional Chinese (Taiwan) into English for below material:
Ethics Committee Letter

Qualifications, Skills & Experience:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Traditional Chinese (Taiwan).
Specialized in any of the field above.
Acute attention to detail, spelling and grammar.
Ability to maintain professionalism in all situations, especially under tight deadlines.
Asian time zone preferred.

Candidates MUST also fulfil any ONE of the following requirements:
A Degree in Translation, Linguistics, or Language Studies or an equivalent degree that includes significant translation training, from a recognized institution of higher education;
2 years of translation experience and a college degree;
5 years of translation experience and no college degree; or
A certificate of competence in translation awarded by an appropriate government body.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Applicants will be asked to sign a confidentiality agreement and complete free Translation, MTPE, and Proofreading tests respectively to evaluate their skills.
In case this skillset matches your profile, please apply directly in this job post with a latest CV attached.
In your CV, please include below:
a) your relevant Translation, MTPE, and Proofreading experience;
b) your proposed best Translation per word rate, MTPE hourly, Proofreading hourly rate in USD.

Only applicants who meet the above criteria will be contacted.

By applying, I confirm I have read and accept TransPerfect's Privacy Policy: https://www.transperfect.com/about/data-privacy-recruiting

Company Description

At QIMA, weâ€™re on a mission to help our clients make products consumers can trust.

Working with over 30,000 global brands, retailers, manufacturers and food growers, we are on the ground wherever products are made. We help businesses secure every step of their supply chain with quality inspections, supplier audits, certifications, and lab testing, all powered by our intelligent digital platform.

Our team of 5,000 QIMers (and counting) across 40 offices and laboratories, are united in our shared passion for innovation and integrity, and guided by our QIMA values in the decisions we make every day. We believe in the work we do, and in making a positive difference in the world. Does this sound like something youâ€™d like to be a part of?

Our Consumer Goods Division is dedicated to helping brands, retailers and manufacturers worldwide deliver safe, quality and ethically made products to their consumers. Every day at work, our inspectors, auditors, and lab techs use their expertise to help safeguard the products you use every day in your home: from clothes and footwear to toys and baby products, to electronics, appliances, and furniture.

Our operations departmentâ€™s purpose is to deliver our industry-leading services to our clients while ensuring that all the work we do is performed to the QIMA standard of quality

Job Description

s an Quality Inspector, youâ€™ll be reporting to Inspector Team Leader or Operations Manager and working as part of our Operations department. The purpose of QIMAâ€™s Operations team is to deliver our industry-leading services to our clients while ensuring that all the work we do is performed to the QIMA standard of quality.

Your main duties will revolve around on-site quality inspections of our clientsâ€™ products.

Check email daily to receive inspection documents.
Attend to inspections on time and communicate with supplier in a professional way.
Perform the inspection of the merchandise according with company procedures. Supervise the stuffing of the containers according with company procedures.
Fulfill inspection reports according with company procedures and timelines.

Qualifications

It could be you if you have:

Possess a college degree or above in apparel or related fields
Good command of English (spoken and written)
Great attention to detail and strong professional ethics

Job_title: Senior Shopify Developer at Your Tech Club
Description:
Join the elite Your Tech Club team and lead the charge in crafting high-performance Shopify solutions for top-tier e-commerce brands. With a focus on scalability, custom integrations, and handling significant traffic volumes, we're in search of a seasoned Shopify Developer with a proven track record.

What You'll Do:
- Develop custom Shopify themes and unique features.
- Create and maintain bespoke integrations with third-party systems.
- Optimize Shopify stores for high traffic efficiency.
- Lead technical strategies for complex, large-scale projects.
What We Need:
- 5+ years of Shopify development experience.
- Expertise in Liquid, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Shopifyâ€™s API.
- Experience with high-revenue e-commerce environments.

Perks:
- Competitive salary with bonuses.
- Flexible work options.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Modern office environment and an inclusive team culture.

 Apply Now! Don't forget to include your CV, cover letter, and importantly, your Portfolio URL along with the URLs of your last 5 Shopify projects to showcase your capabilities.

 Send your application today and let's discuss how you can make a significant impact at Your Tech Club!

 Apply Here - arif@yourtechclub.com

Let's build something remarkable together!

Job_title: Freelance Simplified Chinese (China) into English Life Sciences Translator
Description:
Position Summary:
Linguists are key players at TransPerfect. Your particular language skill and subject matter expertise will allow you to create and finalize the end product before it goes to the client. Under the guidance of your manager and in collaboration with Project Managers, youâ€™ll be responsible for translating and proofreading documents pertaining to a variety of clients in the Life Sciences sectors. TransPerfect offers the possibility to work remotely anywhere in the world.

In order to meet the translation needs of our international clients, we are currently looking to expand our database of freelance linguists who translates from Simplified Chinese (China) into English for below material:
Clinical Research Protocol

Qualifications, Skills & Experience:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Simplified Chinese (China).
Specialized in any of the field above.
Acute attention to detail, spelling and grammar.
Ability to maintain professionalism in all situations, especially under tight deadlines.
Asian time zone preferred.

Candidates MUST also fulfil any ONE of the following requirements:
A Degree in Translation, Linguistics, or Language Studies or an equivalent degree that includes significant translation training, from a recognized institution of higher education;
2 years of translation experience and a college degree;
5 years of translation experience and no college degree; or
A certificate of competence in translation awarded by an appropriate government body.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Applicants will be asked to sign a confidentiality agreement and complete free Translation, MTPE, and Proofreading tests respectively to evaluate their skills.
In case this skillset matches your profile, please apply directly in this job post with a latest CV attached.
In your CV, please include below:
a) your relevant Translation, MTPE, and Proofreading experience;
b) your proposed best Translation per word rate, MTPE hourly, Proofreading hourly rate in USD.

Only applicants who meet the above criteria will be contacted.

By applying, I confirm I have read and accept TransPerfect's Privacy Policy: https://www.transperfect.com/about/data-privacy-recruiting

Who We Are Is What We Do.

Deel and our family of growing companies are made up of global teams dedicated to helping businesses hire anyone, anywhere, easily.

The team comprises over three thousand self-driven individuals spanning over 100 countries, and our unified yet diverse culture keeps us continually learning and innovating the platform and products for customers.

Companies should be able to hire the best talent anywhere in the world, so we are building the best platform to make that a reality. Our market-leading technology, expertise, and global team are crucial to the platformâ€™s success. We deliver the best products and features in our space, enabling millions of jobs worldwide and connecting the global workforce with the best companies and opportunities.

Why should you be part of our success story?

A 30-mile hiring radius should no longer dictate how companies hire because exceptional talent lives everywhere. Deel sees a world without hiring borders and endless talent that pairs perfect candidates with great companies.

We offer global teams all the tools they need to hire, onboard, manage, pay, and scale at full speed. We aim to foster a diverse global economy by building a generational platform that seamlessly connects companies with talent worldwide.

After our successful Series D in 2021, we raised another $50M in 2023, doubling our valuation to $12B. Thereâ€™s never been a more exciting time to join Deel â€” the international payroll and compliance market leader.

What You'll Do At Deel

Grow and own a targeted account list 
Manage the customer buying journey from start to finish, providing guidance and subject matter expertise to prospective customers
Meet or exceed monthly and yearly revenue targets
Qualify and understand client requirements to adapt solutions and meet their needs
Continuously develop a robust sales pipeline through individual outreach and managing inbound prospects
Keep CRM system up to date with customer information, forecasts, and pipeline data so we can learn more about our business and our sales process


Some Key Qualifications

4+ years of sales experience
Previous experience in HR tech sales, ideally selling an HRIS
A proven track record of developing a greenfield territory, executing across the full sales cycle, and adding net new logos
Experience in cross-functional teams to ensure customer success and satisfaction
Desire to work for a fast-paced startup and take on increasing levels of responsibility
Strong written and spoken communication in English


Total Rewards

Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.

Some things youâ€™ll enjoy

Provided computer equipment tailored to your role
Stock grant opportunities dependent on your role, employment status and location
Additional perks and benefits based on your employment status and country
The flexibility of remote work, including WeWork access where available


At Deel, weâ€™re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

Unless otherwise agreed, we will communicate with job applicants using Deel-specific emails, which include @deel.com and other acquired company emails like @payspace.com and @paygroup.com. You can view the most up-to-date job listings at Deel by visiting our careers page.

Deel is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects different abilities, backgrounds, beliefs, experiences, identities and perspectives.

Deel will provide accommodation on request throughout the recruitment, selection and assessment process for applicants with disabilities. If you require accommodation, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team at recruiting@deel.com of the nature of the accommodation that you may require, to ensure your equal participation.

Company Description

We are looking for a skilled and motivated mid-level ASP.NET MVC Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be working with .NET Framework 4.8, Web API, and MS SQL to design, develop, and maintain high-quality web applications. If youâ€™re passionate about building robust, scalable solutions and eager to contribute to an agile team, this is the role for you!

Job Description

Design, develop, and maintain ASP.NET MVC 4 web applications using .NET Framework 4.8. 
Build and maintain RESTful Web APIs to support client-side applications and integrations. 
Write and optimize SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions for MS SQL Server databases. 
Collaborate with front-end developers and UI/UX designers to create seamless and user-friendly experiences. 
Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize existing code for performance and scalability. 
Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices in development, testing, and deployment. 
Work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs. 

Qualifications

3-5 years of experience in ASP.NET MVC development. 
Strong knowledge of .NET Framework 4.8, C#, and OOP principles. 
Experience with Web API development (REST, JSON, and XML). 
Proficiency in MS SQL Server, including T-SQL, stored procedures, and query optimization. 
Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. 
Experience working in an agile environment (Scrum/Kanban). 
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 

Additional Information

Nice to Have:

Knowledge of .NET Core or plans to migrate to it. 
Experience with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS). 
Familiarity with modern front-end frameworks (Angular, React, etc.). 

How to Apply: Send your resume and a brief cover letter to Career(@)flytesolutions.com with the subject line "ASP.NET Developer Application." We look forward to hearing from you!

We are seeking a highly skilled implementation specialist to customize and install software systems for our clients. In this role, you will demonstrate how purchased software systems work to clients, and answer questions relating to implementation. You will also be required to install the software and ensure the client is satisfied with the purchase.

To be successful as an implementation specialist, you should be proficient in the use of SQL data management systems and able to work well as part of a team. Ultimately, an outstanding Implementation Specialist should demonstrate sound technical knowledge as well as exceptional analytical, communication, and customer service skills.

Implementation Specialist Responsibilities

 Meeting with clients following the sale of software packages to collect data and other information required to customize software systems.
 Creating a project plan for each client, detailing the tasks that need to be completed for the timely installation of customized software systems.
 Communicating with clients throughout the software customization process to obtain feedback and approval.
 Customizing software systems based on clients individual needs and specifications.
 Educating clients on how to use purchased software systems and customized system features.
 Creating a specialized document for each client, detailing all customizations made.
 Installing customized software systems and all necessary components.
 Ensuring that the project team is aware of key deliverables and project milestones.
 Providing cost and time estimates to clients who require additional customizations to be done.

Implementation Specialist Requirements

 Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, computer information science, information technology, or a related field.
 Proven experience working as an Implementation Specialist.
 Sound technical knowledge.
 Proficiency in all Microsoft Office applications and SQL database management systems.
 The ability to multitask effectively.
 The ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
 Excellent organizational and time management skills.
 Exceptional communication and customer service skills.
 Detail-oriented.

Job Title: Principal Engineer

Company Name:

Shamolima Limited is a leading supply chain, project support and resourcing company in Bangladesh. SHAMOLIMA has specialized in this sector through our extensive experience of providing Professional Consultancy Services, Supplying Project Materials, Providing Construction and Erection facilities, Supplying Oil and Gas-field related equipment, Power Plant Heavy Engine, Transformers & other heavy material transportation from Mother Vessel to project site after Shipping & Customs clearance under our license.

As part of our expansion plan, we decided to start an innovative and dynamic startup poised to revolutionize the logistics and supply chain industry. We are committed to providing end-to-end visibility and advanced analytics solutions to optimize our clients' freight and supply chain operations management. In addition to that, we will provide managed energy & infrastructure solutions to approach sustainable net zero by 2040.

As we embark on this exciting journey, we seek a visionary Principal Engineer to lead our technology team and drive the development of our cutting-edge platform.

Responsibilities:
1) Technical Leadership:
Provide strategic technical leadership to align the technology vision with the overall business strategy.
Oversee the development and implementation of innovative software and hardware solutions.

2) Planning and Development:
Lead the design, development, and deployment of our supply chain platform.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure delivery on time.
Create (or help create) documents: architecture, design documents, technical guide, etc. as and when necessary.

3) Team Management:
Build and lead a high-performance technology team.
Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.
Principal Engineer will work closely with business stakeholders and the technical team to deliver a technology platform that delivers business results.
Provide guidance and direction to the Java engineering team so that they can achieve their tasks timely, efficiently and with quality.
Work with rest of the team to identify, formalize, size and break down product backlog items mainly web part.
Actively participate in requirement clarification (grooming) and planning activities and provide estimates, assess risk and explore and recommend options for work items
Make sure the team's work meets functional and non-functional (performance, security, usability) requirements.

4) Technology Stack:
The applicants should have experience in the following area(s): Hibernate, Jenkins, Microservice Architecture, Shell Scripting, SPRING boot, Spring Security, Tomcat
AWS, CI/CD, Java, Linux, Object Oriented Programming, Python
Good understanding of DevOps processes and tools

5) Back-End:

Mastery of the latest Java language (Java 1.8 or later) and Java related frameworks (e.g. Spring, Hibernate etc.)
Highly proficient with Web Services (REST, SOAP) and related technologies
Experience with Consuming different API's on the web
Database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, CockroachDB or similar database
Expert knowledge of JVM, memory management, garbage collection, multi-threading/concurrency concerns and ORM technologies, including Hibernate, Jell
Well-versed in JSON, XML and similar technologies
Solid understanding of networking including HTTP, TCP/IP, UDP
Proficiency in building and deploying applications on AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, etc.) with a strong understanding of cloud architecture best practices.

6) Front-End:

Very good knowledge of Javascript and Javascript-based framework (e.g. JQuery)
Well-versed with HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap and related technologies
Familiarity with one of Angular, ReactJS, KnockoutJS and similar framework is preferred.

7) Highly desirable:
Experience with real time queuing systems (Kafka)
Experience with NoSQL Databases (MongoDB, Couchbase)
Experience with a different language is strongly preferred (Python, Go, Ruby, Scala etc.)
Experience with Mobile Network, Geolocation, Payment systems
Experience with containers, container repositories and related technologies

8) Security and Compliance:
Ensure the security and compliance of the platform with industry standards and regulations.
 Qualifications:
Proven experience in leading a talented team in a technology-driven environment.
Strong background in software development, architecture, and project management.
Experience in building and scaling complex, real-time platforms.
Knowledge of supply chain, logistics, or related industries is a plus.
Demonstrated success in leading and mentoring high-performing teams.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Bachelorâ€™s or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science or a related field.

Experience requirement

At least 8 years in the mentioned domains

Benefit package:
 1. Industry standard competitive salary.
2. Two (2) Festival Bonus.
3. All other applicable benefits as per company policy that will be furnished gradually.

RTI International is an independent, nonprofit research institute dedicated to improving the human condition.â€¯ Our staff of nearly 6,000 works in more than 75 countries—tackling hundreds of projects each year to address complex social and scientific challenges on behalf of governments, businesses, foundations, universities, and other clients and partners. Through independent research and science-based programs, we are making positive impacts on people and communities around the world. Our diverse team embraces challenges in an inclusive atmosphere that values work-life balance and creates global opportunities for career development. If youâ€™re looking for a dynamic workplace culture, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities to grow, join our team and discover the RTI Difference. 
Division Summary 
IDGâ€™s Global Health Division works in Neglected Tropical Diseases, infectious disease, including TB, HIV/AIDS, and Malaria; global health security, Heath Systems Strengthening - including Health Governance, Health Finance, Human Resources for Health, Capacity Building, and Health Policy and Advocacy; Public-Private Partnerships; and Maternal-Neonatal-Child Heath and Reproductive Health and Family Planning. We address a range of public health problems to reduce disparities, lower disease burdens, and build locally owned sustainable health programs in lower- and middle-income countries. 
Project Summary 
USAID/Bangladesh has recently awarded RTI a $60 million USD, five-year Cooperative Agreement to strengthen local level health systems to deliver quality, equitable public health services while optimizing resources to improve the health status of all Bangladeshis residing at the local level. 
 This Activity will focus on the following four objectives: 1) Strengthen Systems for Local-Level Evidence-Based Planning, 2) Strengthen Systems to Deliver Equitable, Quality, Integrated Local Level Public Health Services, 3) 
Improve Enabling Environment to Operate Local Level Public Health Systems, and 4) Improve Local Level Public Health System Resilience. 
 Position Description 
RTI is seeking an HSS Specialist in Bangladesh. The HSS Specialist will lead and coordinate the implementation of the SLLHS project activities and provide technical expertise. This position reports to the Senior HSS Advisor and works alongside a team of fellow HSS specialists at the National level. 
  Develop and implement strategies to strengthen local health systems in line with project objectives. 
Offer technical expertise and guidance to local partners and stakeholders on health systems strengthening approaches and best practices. 
Carry out assessments of local health systems to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement. Analyze data to inform decision-making. 
Develop and implement capacity building plans for local health system stakeholders to enhance their skills and knowledge in health systems strengthening. 
Foster collaboration and coordination among local health system stakeholders, including government agencies, NGOs, private sector and other partners. 
Facilitate knowledge sharing and learning among project staff, partners, and stakeholders to promote continuous improvement in health systems strengthening approaches. 
Identify and mitigate risks related to health systems strengthening activities to ensure smooth implementation of interventions. 
Contributes to the successful implementation of the SLLHS project. 
Ensures best practices and lessons learned are captured and disseminated across project. 
May serve as a representative of the project to clients, stakeholders, and partners, providing key inputs for technical or management decisions. 
  Bachelor's degree in medical science or health systems management or a related field and 8 years of experience, or a master's degree and 6 years of experience, or equivalent combination of education and experience. 
Extensive expertise in the implementation of health system strengthening initiatives and/or capacity strengthening. 
In-depth knowledge of health systems strengthening frameworks and experience applying these frameworks in low-resource settings. 
Ability to conduct comprehensive health systems assessments, including health service delivery, health workforce, health information systems, access to essential medicines, and financing mechanisms. 
Understanding of quality improvement methodologies and tools, such as continuous quality improvement (CQI) approaches, and experience in applying these to improve the quality of health services. 
Familiarity with different health service delivery models, including integrated service delivery, and ability to recommend appropriate models based on local context and needs. 
Knowledge of health information systems, including demographic health information system 2 (DHIS2) and experience in strengthening these systems to improve data collection, analysis, and use for decision-making.
Understanding of health financing mechanisms, including government health budgets, health insurance schemes, and donor funding, and ability to recommend strategies to optimize resources for health systems strengthening.
Skills in policy analysis and advocacy to support policy change for health systems strengthening, including engaging with government officials and other stakeholders to influence policy decisions.
Strong communication and coordination skills to work effectively with diverse stakeholders, including government agencies, NGOs, and community groups, to achieve health systems strengthening objectives.
Knowledge of health equity and social inclusion principles and experience in ensuring that health systems are responsive to the needs of vulnerable and marginalized populations.
Excellent knowledge of MS Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, Excel.
Proficiency in English is required. 
Ability to work throughout Bangladesh.

Your Role And Responsibilities

In this role, you will have the opportunity to drive service sales processes, generate service sales opportunities and secure profitable sales within the designated areas. Description:
DevTech Partners is looking for Project Engineer

Key Points
At Devtech Partners, project engineers have the chance to work on large-scale government/Private infrastructure projects, which allows for skill enhancement and progression to higher management roles over time.

Job Description / Responsibility
Project Planning and Scheduling: Developing and maintaining detailed project schedules, allocating resources, and planning the sequence of work.
Design and Technical Oversight: Working with architects, engineers, and other stakeholders to review designs, technical drawings, and specifications to ensure feasibility and compliance with regulations. 
Budget Management: Assisting in preparing budgets, tracking project costs, and managing financial resources to ensure projects stay within allocated budgets. 
Resource Allocation: Ensuring the proper allocation of labor, materials, and equipment required for project execution. 
Site Supervision: Monitoring daily construction activities to ensure work is carried out according to plans, quality standards, and safety regulations. 
Problem Solving: Identifying and resolving technical issues that arise during construction, ensuring minimal delays. 
Compliance and Permitting: Ensuring that the project adheres to building codes, permits, environmental laws, and other regulatory requirements. 
Quality Control: Implementing quality assurance procedures to ensure that work meets the desired standards and specifications. 
Coordination with Subcontractors: Liaising with subcontractors and suppliers, ensuring that materials and services are delivered on time and in accordance with the project timeline. 
Documentation and Reporting: Preparing progress reports, maintaining project documentation, and ensuring accurate record-keeping throughout the project lifecycle. 

Educational Requirements
Diploma in Civil
Bachelor in Engineering (BEngg) in Civil Engineering
Skills Required: Project Management, site supervision, Resource Management, Bill Processing, Documentation and Reporting, Civil Construction works, Quality Control Management, BOQ Analysis, Structural Designing, Problem Solving Ability

Experience Requirements
At least 5 year(s)

Additional Requirements
Must Have project experience in large industrial/Govt. infrastructure, gained within a shortperiod while working under the supervision of a conductor or sub-conductor. 
Must have skills include structural analysis to ensure buildings and bridges are safe anddurable, project management to oversee construction projects from start to finish, andproblem-solving to address complex engineering challenges. 
Real estate construction experiences will not be considered as candidates experience. 
Candidates preparing for higher studies are not invited to apply. 
Preference will be given to candidates with experience in steel shutter budget calculation. 
Candidates with experience in estimating, Billing item wise BOQ rating will be given preference.

Job Location
Dhaka, Dhaka (Aftabnagar)

Salary
Tk. 30000 - 40000 (Monthly)

Description:
Futureed Corporation Ltd is looking for Study Abroad Counsellor

Job Description / Responsibility
A Study Abroad Counselor plays a critical role in guiding students through the complex process of studying abroad. The key job responsibilities include:
Student Counseling:
Provide one-on-one counseling to students on study abroad options based on their academic background, interests, and career goals.
Advise students on suitable countries, universities, and programs for their study abroad plans. Offer guidance on application processes, admission requirements, and deadlines.
Application Assistance:
Help students in preparing and submitting university applications, reviewing documents like personal statements, recommendation letters, and resumes.
Assist with preparing necessary documentation for visa applications and guiding students through the visa process.
Program and University Research:
Keep up to date with the latest trends in international education and maintain a database of universities, courses, and scholarship opportunities.
Provide students with information about entry requirements, language tests (e.g., IELTS, TOEFL), and scholarship opportunities.
Pre-Departure Support:
Assist students with accommodation, travel, and financial planning.
Conduct pre-departure sessions that cover topics like cultural adaptation, health insurance, and budgeting.
Networking & Partnerships:
Build and maintain relationships with international universities, educational institutions, and student bodies. Collaborate with universities to stay updated on changing policies, scholarships, and other opportunities. Marketing & Outreach: Conduct seminars, workshops, and presentations at schools, colleges, and online platforms to promote studying abroad.
Collaborate with marketing teams to develop brochures, digital content, and newsletters on study abroad programs.
Follow-up & Post-arrival Assistance:
Regularly check in with students throughout the application process to ensure timely submission of documents.
Provide post-arrival support, including helping with accommodation or settling in a new country.

Educational Requirements
Bachelor/Honors
Diploma
Skills Required: Visa Processing, Student Counselling, Student Visa Processing, UK Visa Processing, Canada Visa Processing, Visa submission procedure

Experience Requirements
At least 1 year(s)

Job_title: Manager - MEAL & MIS - For A Reputed International NGO (Job ID : 1295798)
Description:
A Reputed International NGO is looking for Manager - MEAL & MIS

Job Description / Responsibility
Starting Date: December 2024
Reports to: Program Manager Shelter
Coordinates with: Shelter team
Direct line manager of: MEAL Team

Main Responsibilities
Project implementation
Provide technical support for MEAL planning and implementation, conducting rapid and regular assessments such as vulnerability studies, analysis of shelter and site improvement, feedback mechanisms, gender and stakeholder analysis, and baseline studies in emergency response in the Rohingya camps.
Develop Cloud-base App and application of appropriate methods for MEAL in shelter project including emergency response and site improvements in the camps, and designing tools and materials for regular data collection related to shelter and site improvement and provide technical support to the data-collectors and program team users by using tablets/smart phone.
Conduct periodic reviews of shelter project MEAL systems to refine MEAL practices and systems and to address gaps or challenges. This includes the site improvement activities too.
Prepare and implement monitoring tools for the shelter project including site improvement activities like developing checklists, questionnaires, progress trackers, etc. to gather the achievements and failures in line with the shelter project log frame.
Manage MEAL team (if any) and guide them to perform regular MEAL activity under shelter project and site improvement in the Rohingya camps.
Ensure site improvement and shelter project monitoring systems provide timely, high-quality data that is consistently collected, analyzed and shared with project management, implementing partners (if any) and stakeholders.
To roll out and functionalize the CFRM mechanism in the shelter project, and collect data/information from Help Desk, analyze, and share CFRM data with the respective program team. Conduct regular follow-ups on the raised complaints, feedback, and response mechanism. Any case that falls under sensitive category, ensure referral to HR Officer with due confidentiality.
Measure achievements of shelter project including site improvement activities as per log frame updating IPTT, Output Tracker, and activity tracker in a timely manner.
Prepare MEAL reports and different necessary rapid assessment reports on emergency response in Rohingya camps and timely delivery to the Program Unit or Management complying with donor requirements. This includes sharing with project management, implementing partners (if any) and stakeholders.
Assist developing of shelter project development and lead on preparing monitoring framework and necessary log frame for shelter, site improvement and emergency response in the camps.
Export shelter and site improvement data from cloud and prepare master roll daily basis and share with program for day-to-day activity implementation.
Undertake visits at the shelter sites improvement activities including visits at the block level as per the MEAL demand, ensure process monitoring is done according to individual plan. Share field visit reports with the respective team, which will guide in taking appropriate actions against gaps and improvement for decision making.

Information management and reporting
Lead & ensure all program and monitoring data under shelter and site improvement activities are recorded in the project databases and tracking tools in a timely and accurate manner.
Preserve all regular program and MEAL reporting data and information with the line manager for future uses of the Organization. This includes regularly uploading final version in the SharePoint.
Prepare monthly reports on MEAL activities, contribute to prepare other reports of shelter project such as annual reports, donor report, NGOAB reports, case studies, etc.
Prepare any need-based reports on request such as situation report, incident report, etc.

Capacity Strengthening
Lead on building technical capacities of the Enumerators/MEAL casual staff and MEAL team members (if any).
Develop and facilitate/co-facilitate MEAL workshops/training for the shelter and site improvement program staffs as needs are identified by line supervisor.
Facilitate camp level technical training and orientation sessions to the beneficiaries, Volunteers, program team once any new tools and apps developed. This includes update/upgrade knowledge/skills
Participate in different trainings, meetings in line with the role and nominated by the line manager.

Safety and Security
Provide timely incident report to the line manager as needed.
Follow safety and security guidelines of organization and contribute to strengthen the security policy, guidelines, SOPs, etc,

General
Deliver high quality results in line with the terms of reference agreed in advance â€“ to do this in a way which maintains the reputation of the Humanitarian Department.
Comply with organization policies and practice with respect to code of conduct, health and safety, equal opportunities and other relevant policies and procedures.
Proactively support organization commitments to gender equality, child protection and disability sensitivity: i) Implement all work-related activities with a gender, disability and child protection lens, considering the different needs, concerns and ideas of our staff and beneficiaries ii)Ensure the incorporation of gender equity principles in all policies and activities iii) Encourage the participation of all genders in meeting and on committees iv)Help build an inclusive office environment where people do not feel disadvantaged or judged according to their gender or limited due to manageable disability.
To perform such other responsibilities as agreed with your line management.

REGULATIONS AND POLICIES:
The post holder abides by all internal rules, regulations and policies and accepts new responsibilities as and when those are assigned by the line manager. The post holder is polite, respectful, honest, punctual (and respects deadlines), creative, pacifist, proactive, committed and â€“ during office hours â€“ non-political. S/he is in constant exchange with colleagues and supervisors, communicates problems and enriches discussions. S/he treats people of different religions, age, sex, and economic status appropriate and equally and actively ensures their wellbeing and raises his voice when required.

Skills Required: Computer skill, Microsoft Word, Excel

At least 5 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): NGO

Additional Requirements
Prior knowledge of Coxâ€™s bazar humanitarian contexts especially in Shelter/NFI, Site improvement and DRR related MEAL activity & MIS system in camps is required.
Ability to work on word, Excel, and PowerPoint
Demonstrated knowledge and skills in data analysis and report generation.
Demonstrated knowledge and skills in writing analytical and descriptive reports in English.
Strong training and facilitation skills.
Demonstrated knowledge and skills on gender, diversity and inclusion issues and experiences in applying them into MEAL framework.
Strong knowledge and experiences in develop/design FCRM strategies especially in shelter and site improvement projects.

Professional requirements
Strong knowledge on cloud-based Apps related tools development and control
Digital Data Management
Knowledge on different standards (Sphere, Core Humanitarian Standards, etc).
Good communication and leadership skills.

Job_title: IT Associate (For Catalyst Solutions) - Job ID - 1298425
Description:
Catalyst Solutions is looking for IT Associate


Job Description / Responsibility
Catalyst Solutions, a multinational company based in the USA and Canada, seeks several dynamic IT professionals to ensure seamless internet connectivity. This is paramount to guarantee uninterrupted access to our services for our esteemed Fortune 500 clients worldwide, 24/7, 365 days a year. Given our standing as a data analytics firm, adherence to the ISO 27001:2013 standard is foundational to our operations.

We invite applicants who self-identify as tech-savvy individuals, early adopters of cutting-edge technology, and possess extensive abilities to understand and enhance every new technology introduced within our offices, much like any other office in Bangladesh.

Responsibilities-
Ensure 24/7 internet access at all times, with the bandwidth that has been procured from our ISP across all offices.
Ensuring that every workstation functions properly and that every employee complies with our internal IT guidelines.
Install, configure, and troubleshoot computer software, systems, networks, printers, and scanners.
Keep an updated inventory of all electronic devices.
Ensure data security compliance, in accordance with ISO 27001:2013, for all personnel, from Office Assistants to the Managing Director.
Utilizing IP cameras consistently to ensure continuous access for management and to mitigate any potential failures.
Ensuring fail-safe is installed in all IT equipment. 
Documentation:
Maintain achievement lists and Career Scorecards for personal career growth.
Complete and fill out checklists promptly.
Maintain maintenance logs and IT incident reports with accurate data.
Show aptitude for learning new technology to enhance the IT infrastructure in alignment with our US office.
Assist the recruitment team in hiring IT personnel. 
Collaborating as a team to support other departments, irrespective of geographical boundaries..
The IT department is responsible for managing any equipment that operates on electricity, including bulbs, fans, voltage stabilizers etc. 

Educational Requirements
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
Diploma in Engineering in Telecommunication
Skills Required: IT Support Service, Hard Working, Computer Hardware and Networking, Computer Troubleshooting, Internet Service Provider, CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate), Good communication skills., MS Office suites

Experience Requirements
At least 2 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): IT Enabled Service,Computer Hardware/Network Companies

Job Location
Chattogram (Chittagong Sadar Chawkbazar), Dhaka (DOHS Baridhara)

Northern Corporation Limited, a reputed company, manufacturing garments for world class global brands is looking for dynamic and result-oriented professional to join in our HR team to support our continuous business growth.
Job Responsibilities:

Create a compensation strategy for all employees based on market research and pay surveys; keeps the strategy up to date.
Investigate employee issues and conflicts and brings them to resolution.
Ensure the organizationâ€™s compliance with local, state and federal regulations.
Use performance management tools to provide guidance and feedback to team.
Ensure all company HR policies are applied consistently.

Maintain HR systems and processes.

Job_title: Manager - ICT - For Soorty Textile (BD) Ltd. - Job ID : 1301155
Location: Comilla Adarsha Sadar Upazila, Chattogram, Bangladesh
Description:
Soorty Textile (BD) Ltd. is looking for Manager - ICT

Job Description / Responsibility
Overall Enterprise Architecture: Virtualization Cisco Servers Cluster based Develop and maintain the overall enterprise architecture framework to ensure alignment with business goals and objectives.
Define and implement standards, guidelines, and best practices for IT architecture and systems integration.
Evaluate emerging technologies and assess their potential impact on the organization's IT landscape. 
Infrastructure Development: Collaborate with the Group Head of IT & ERP to develop the organization's IT infrastructure, including the installation and maintenance of standard computer equipment.
Ensure the effective distribution of IT equipment across different departments and locations. 
Inventory Management: Oversee the inventory of computer hardware, laptops, printers, UPS, scanners, multimedia projectors, and various types of software and operating systems.
Develop and implement efficient inventory tracking systems to ensure timely replenishment and prevent stock outs. 
System Monitoring and Management: Monitor and manage all existing systems, network appliances, hardware, and other IT infrastructure components to ensure optimal performance and security.
Implement proactive measures to identify and address potential issues before they escalate. 
Attendance System and IT Support: Oversee the development and maintenance of attendance systems, hardware and networking infrastructure, and IT support services.
Provide technical support to end-users on a company-wide scale, including resolving hardware and software issues and ensuring data integrity. 
Disaster Recovery Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive disaster recovery plans to mitigate the impact of unforeseen disasters, unplanned power outages, and downtime.
Coordinate with relevant stakeholders to ensure swift data recovery and minimal disruption to business operations.
Vendor Management: Communicate with service providers, vendors, and organizations to negotiate contracts, procure necessary IT equipment and services, and address any issues or concerns.
Evaluate vendor performance and make recommendations for improvements or changes as needed.
Budgeting and Equipment Needs: Determine IT budget requirements based on organizational goals and technological needs.
Identify and prioritize equipment needs, ensuring optimal allocation of resources and alignment with strategic objectives.
Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for software, hardware, and network configurations, procedures, and policies.
Ensure documentation is regularly updated and accessible to relevant stakeholders for reference and training purposes.
Team Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify IT requirements and opportunities for process improvement.
Provide leadership and guidance to IT staff, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.
VMware Certified Professional - Cloud Management and Automation 2020 (VCP-CMA 2020)CCNA, Microsoft O365, Azure etc.
Educational Requirements
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
Experience Requirements
8 to 10 year(s)
Job Location
Cumilla (Cumilla Sadar Dakshin)

Job Description / Responsibility

Develop and maintain applications using Full Stack Laravel PHP and related technologies.
Design, code, and maintain database objects, stored procedures, and other application components.
Work with the product and design teams to develop user interfaces and other client-side logic.
Collaborate with other developers to create solutions that meet the business and technical requirements.
Utilize best practices and coding standards to ensure high-quality code.

Perform unit testing of developed code to ensure it meets the requirements.
Ensure that applications adhere to security and performance standards.

Develop, test, and deploy robust web applications using Laravel + ReactJS/ Vue.js /Angular.

At least 4 year(s)

Minimum 4 years of experience in web development. 4+ years of experience in PHP and relevant frameworks

Proficiency in Laravel: Strong experience in developing and maintaining applications using
Laravel, including a deep understanding of its core features and best practices. Working experience with the latest versions like Laravel 9.x or higher is a must.
Advanced Eloquent ORM Knowledge: Proven experience with Eloquent ORM, including relationships, scopes, and query building.
Database Optimization Skills: Expertise in MySQL and proficiency in writing optimized queries and using indexing strategies to enhance performance.

API Development and Security: Strong understanding of RESTful API design principles and experience in implementing API authentication and security best practices.
Version Control with Git: Proficient in using Git for version control, with knowledge of workflows like Git Flow.

Understanding of DevOps Practices: Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
Problem-solving abilities: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to challenges.
