Experience with Advanced Laravel Features: Knowledge of Laravel features such as events, middleware, queues, and broadcasting.
Experience with Kubernetes: Knowledge on orchestration with Kubernetes is a plus.
Understanding of Cloud Platforms: Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., Digital Ocean, AWS, Azure, GCP).
Agile/Scrum Development Experience: Familiarity with Agile or Scrum methodologies for project management and development.
Continuous Learning and Adaptability: A demonstrated commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technology trends and best practices.

Job_title: Full-Stack Laravel Web Application Developer- For Doptor Ltd.- Job ID - 1299564
Description:
Doptor Ltd. is looking for Full-Stack Laravel Web Application Developer

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Laravel Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have strong backend and frontend development skills, hands-on experience in managing servers, and proficiency in version control systems and modern web technologies. You will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining robust web applications, optimizing server performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, maintain, and optimize Laravel-based web applications.
Implement and integrate APIs and third-party services.
Manage and maintain Cloudways Root Server (or similar cloud-based hosting platforms).
Manage and configure servers, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Collaborate with the design team to create responsive and interactive frontends using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js (or similar frameworks).
Utilize Git for version control and effective project collaboration.
Use Composer for dependency management in Laravel projects.
Debug, troubleshoot, and optimize performance for both frontend and backend systems.
Adhere to software development best practices, including code reviews, testing, and deployment.

Educational Requirements
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
Skills Required: Laravel, Full stack developer, Problem Solving Skills

Experience Requirements
At least 4 year(s)

Additional Requirements
Minimum 4 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer using Laravel.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to tackling technical challenges.
Ability to work both independently and within a collaborative team environment.

Preferred Skills (Bonus):
Experience with DigitalOcean, AWS, or Google Cloud platforms.
Familiarity with Docker and containerized applications.
Knowledge of NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Redis.
Experience in setting up SSL certificates, managing DNS, and domain configurations.

Technical Requirements:
Strong proficiency with Laravel (minimum 4 years of experience).
Experience in PHP development and a solid understanding of MVC architecture.
Experience with server management tools such as Cloudways, DigitalOcean, or other cloud platforms.
Proficient in working with MySQL or other relational databases.
Knowledge of Git version control systems (branching, merging, and pull requests).
Experience with Composer for managing PHP packages and libraries.
Strong experience with JavaScript frameworks like Vue.js, React, or Angular.
Good understanding of HTML5, CSS3, SASS/LESS, and responsive design principles.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and working with JSON data formats.
Knowledge of Unit Testing, Test-Driven Development (TDD), and code optimization practices.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated deployments.
Proficient in command-line tools and working with Linux/Unix environments.
Familiarity with WebSocket integration, real-time data processing, and API authentication methods (OAuth2, JWT).
Experience with raw SQL queries.
Experience with international and local payment gateway integration.

Job Location
Dhaka (Khilgaon)

Salary
Tk. 35000 - 50000 (Monthly)
